hibernate-mapping.query: from EndUser where Deleted = 0 and Activated = 1 and (:DependencyId = -1 or DependencyId = :DependencyId)
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT eu.EndUserId, eu.Name, d.Name DependencyName FROM ProjectsAndTendering.EndUsers eu INNER JOIN Dependencies d ON d.DependencyId = eu.DependencyId WHERE eu.Deleted = 0 and eu.Activated = 1 AND d.Deleted = 0 and d.Activated = 1 AND eu.Name like :Name AND (:DependencyId = -1 OR eu.DependencyId = :DependencyId)
